identity.title: Displaying the Days That are Above 32 Degrees Fahrenheit

content.prompt: Construct a program that reads a series of temperatures and reports the days that are above 32 degrees Fahrenheit. Assume that the temperature values are in Fahrenheit. Also assume that input values could have a decimal point.
